text: Hi guys i want to create cms based on react js and HubSpot cms. How i can do this? I dont know how to connect react.js ( next.js app ) with HubSpot as a theme/ template.

Hi there! Does anyone know how to access the HubSpot User’s profile photo/avatar within templates, specifically the custom quote template? Not that it probably matters what template is. I’d really appreciate any help you can offer!
